title: Aria Li
text: Hello! I’m Aria. I enjoy painting and would love to exchange art supplies and ideas with fellow creatives!

title: Michael Santos
text: Hey, I'm Michael! I have a passion for cooking and am keen on sharing kitchen gadgets and recipes.

title: Sophia Kim
text: Hi, I’m Sophia, a fitness enthusiast looking to exchange workout equipment and fitness advice.

title: Chris Jordan
text: Chris here! I'm a movie buff interested in exchanging DVDs and film paraphernalia with other cinephiles.

title: Emma Clark
text: Hi! I'm Emma, an avid reader looking to swap books and discuss literature with others.

title: Oscar Williams
text: Hey everyone, I’m Oscar. I love gardening and am excited to share plants and gardening tips.

title: Grace Thompson
text: Hello! I'm Grace, a music lover looking to trade musical instruments and sheet music.

title: Elijah Mitchell
text: Elijah here! I’m into photography and would love to share camera gear and photo ideas.

title: Isabella Perez
text: I’m Isabella, a fashion enthusiast excited to swap clothes and styling tips with others.

title: Oliver Johnson
text: Hey, I’m Oliver. I'm a gamer interested in exchanging video games and gaming accessories.
